dataIdInfo.idPurp: A shapefile containing data for proposed water quality targets for E coli, reductions to meet targets and required mitigations for the Horizons Region for public engagement in November 2023.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: For more information on the proposed water quality targets and potential mitigations please see https://haveyoursay.horizons.govt.nz/waterqualitytargets and https://freshwater.horizons.govt.nz/. Contact info@ourfreshwaterfuture.nz for any queries.

idCitation.resTitle: Horizons Oranga Wai Water Quality Targets (E coli) Engagement 2023

Consts.useLimit: Any data provided are within the framework of our data quality system, from the best data currently available. Unless otherwise specified, Horizons Regional Council is the owner of the copyright existing in the presented material and it is required that any use of the material, for example by inclusion in a report or media release, be accompanied by an acknowledgement of the source.
